# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#7)

#### Question

When Kaladin helped Adolin fight in the arena, did Elhokar notice him surgebinding?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. :)
